fields.description:

{code}

Zk leader process down has happened almost at the same time 
On startup of  zk process znode for application was available

*Current*
RM going down and Job failure

*Expected*

 Submitted Job can fail but RM shutdown i not required

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: ZKRMStateStore.syncInternal shouldn't wait for sync completion for avoiding blocking ZK's event thread

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: ZooKeeper server should better handle SessionMovedException.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: ZKRMStateStore shouldn't create new session without occurrance of SESSIONEXPIED
